name: Potato Thriller
description: Known for deep frying his victims, Potato Man is the most notorious serial killer out there...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: 9/10. Great game. No need to open doors - they will open when they are supposed to. A little slow to begin with. Quirky, funny, scary.

A Game with amazing Graphics, the Funniest Memes, a Story better than Undertale and great scares  a game for the entire Family i Laughed i cried i fapped i screamed  10/10 - IGN  here is my ♥♥♥♥♥♥ let`s play of it :         YouTube™ Video:  GAME OF THE YEAR 2016 | Potato Thriller Steam Edition Pt.1
Possibly the most accurate recreation of P.T.
-Being chased by killer potato -stop to turn off all TVs i see -many potatos stare at me in disgust -escape into elevator  10/10 would recommend
Just because it's a meme game doesn't mean you should put no effort into making a game that's good.
YouTube™ Video:  Steam Cleaning - Potato Thriller Steamed Potato Edition
